skill.name: Mystic Ally
skill.description:
Cooldown: 30 seconds

Active: Your mystic ally has its damage increased by 50% for 10 seconds.

Passive: A mystic ally fights by your side. The ally deals 130% of your weapon damage as Physical per swing. When the ally dies, it is reborn after 5 seconds.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cooldown: 30 seconds

Active: Your mystic ally has its damage increased for a short duration.

Passive: A mystic ally fights by your side.

rune.name: Air Ally
rune.description:
Active: You gain 100 Spirit.

Passive: A mystic ally fights by your side that increases your Spirit Regeneration by 4.
rune.simpleDescription:
Active: You gain a burst of Spirit.

Passive: A mystic ally fights by your side that increases your Spirit Regeneration.

skill.name: Wave of Light
skill.description:
Cost: 75 Spirit

Focus a wave of light that crushes enemies for 835% weapon damage as Holy.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cost: 75 Spirit

Ring a mystic bell that crushes enemies.

rune.name: Explosive Light
rune.description: Release bursts of energy that deal 830% weapon damage as Fire to nearby enemies.
rune.simpleDescription: Release bursts of energy that deal Fire damage to enemies.

skill.name: Epiphany
skill.description:
Cooldown: 60 seconds

Have an Epiphany, increasing your Spirit Regeneration per Second by 20 and enabling your melee attacks to instantly dash to your target for 15 seconds.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cooldown: 60 seconds

Have an Epiphany, increasing your Spirit Regeneration per Second and enabling your melee attacks to instantly dash to your target for 15 seconds.

rune.name: Desert Shroud
rune.description: Infuse yourself with sand, reducing damage taken by 50%.
rune.simpleDescription: Infuse yourself with sand, reducing damage taken.

skill.name: Dashing Strike
skill.description:
Cost: 1 Charge

Quickly dash up to 50 yards, striking enemies along the way for 370% weapon damage as Physical.

You gain a charge every 8 seconds and can have up to 2 charges stored at a time.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cost: 1 Charge

Quickly dash and strike enemies.

You gain a charge every 8 seconds and can have up to 2 charges stored at a time.

rune.name: Way of the Falling Star
rune.description:
Gain 20% increased movement speed for 4 seconds after using Dashing Strike.

Dashing Strike's damage turns into Holy.
rune.simpleDescription:
Gain increased movement speed after using Dashing Strike.

Dashing Strike's damage turns into Holy.

skill.name: Sweeping Wind
skill.description:
Cost: 75 Spirit

Surround yourself in a vortex that continuously deals 105% weapon damage to all enemies within 10 yards. The vortex lasts 6 seconds and is refreshed each time you strike an enemy with a melee attack. Landing a Critical Hit has a chance to increase the vortex effect up to 3 stacks for a total of 315% weapon damage.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cost: 75 Spirit

Surround yourself in a vortex for 6 seconds that damages nearby enemies. Critical Hits intensify the vortex.

rune.name: Inner Storm
rune.description:
As long as your vortex is at 3 or more stacks, you gain 8 Spirit per second.

Sweeping Wind's damage turns into Holy.
rune.simpleDescription:
Gain Spirit whenever the vortex is at 3 or more stacks.

Sweeping Wind's damage turns into Holy.

skill.name: Mantra of Salvation
skill.description:
Cost: 50 Spirit

Active: You and nearby allies gain an additional 20% increased resistance to all elements for 3 seconds.

Passive: You and your allies within 60 yards gain 20% increased resistance to all elements.

Only one Mantra may be active at a time.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cost: 50 Spirit

Active: You and nearby allies gain greatly increased resistance to all elements.

Passive: You and nearby allies gain increased resistance to all elements.

Only one Mantra may be active at a time.

rune.name: Agility
rune.description: Passive: Mantra of Salvation also increases Dodge Chance by 35%.
rune.simpleDescription: Passive: Mantra of Salvation also increases Dodge Chance.

skill.name: Seize the Initiative
skill.description: Dealing damage to enemies above 75% Life increases your attack speed by 30% for 4 seconds.
skill.flavor: The Monks of Ivgorod are trained to move like water — flowing freely into open spaces and crashing hard against their foes.

skill.name: Unity
skill.description: Each ally affected by your Mantras increases your damage by 5%, up to a maximum of 20%, and has 5% increased damage.
skill.flavor: "I thought I was done for, trampled into the snow. Suddenly I felt her hand on my shoulder. The warmth returned to my bones, and together we repelled the beasts." —Legends of the North

skill.name: Harmony
skill.description: 40% of your single elemental resistances from items instead increases your resistance to all elements.
skill.flavor: Ice hunters brave months of frozen darkness. Desert traders bear relentless, scorching sun. This world is ours to endure.

skill.name: Sixth Sense
skill.description: Reduce all non-Physical damage taken by 25%.
skill.flavor: The final test of the Serpent's Form takes place in "The Pit of 12 Vipers." The initiates are not told about the 13th.

mainHand.name: Incense Torch of the Grand Temple
Thunderfury, Blessed Blade of the Windseeker

skill.name: Heal
skill.description:
Cooldown: 30 seconds

Heals you and the Templar for 193112 Life.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cooldown: 30 seconds

Heals you and the Templar.

skill.name: Intimidate
skill.description: Enemies that hit or are hit by the Templar are slowed by 80% for 3 seconds.
skill.simpleDescription: Enemies that hit or are hit by the Templar are slowed.

skill.name: Charge
skill.description:
Cooldown: 10 seconds

Charges a target, dealing 280% weapon damage and stunning all enemies within 8 yards for 3 seconds.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cooldown: 10 seconds

Charges an enemy, dealing damage and stunning nearby enemies.

skill.name: Inspire
skill.description:
Increases your resource generation.

Mana: 7 per second.
Hatred: 1 per second.
Wrath: 1.1 per second.
Arcane Power: 1.4 per second.
Fury: 10% generated.
Spirit: 10% generated.
